item.description: Hi, I’m a backend/platform developer (IT Contractor). Noteworthy skills and experiences: Amazon Web Services, Microservices, JVM languages & frameworks. Also familiar with Machine Learning and Data Science, Data Engineering concepts (created training datasets, trained models, and used them in production).
